prompt:
I have the following count table for an RNA-seq experiment, rows are genes and columns are samples, "Supplementary_Table_1_exp.xlsx". The first column of the file is my gene names and the rest of the columns are samples. My annotation data is here  "SRP021193.colData.tsv", it contains sample annotations and rows of this matches the columns of count table, first column is the sample ids. Find genes specific for each "group" in my annotation data  using statistical tests. Plot PCA only using "group" specific genes and color code PCA by "group" variable in my annotation data.

here are first few lines of the file(s).

Supplementary_Table_1_exp.xlsx:
Genes	CASE_1	CASE_2	CASE_3	CASE_4	CASE_5	CASE_6	CTRL_1	CTRL_2	CTRL_3	CTRL_4	CTRL_5	CTRL_6
TSPAN6	9832	25521	23529	0	32	0	10558	20573	6507	0	0	 0
TNMD	3281	 7167	 3435	0	 0	0	  202	  403	 203	0	0	21


SRP021193.colData.tsv:
	diagnosis	group	LibrarySelection
CASE_1	non-ischemic cardiomyopathy	CASE	cDNA


response:
```
# Load required libraries
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(edgeR)
library(ggplot2)

# Read count table
count_table <- read_excel("Supplementary_Table_1_exp.xlsx", col_names = TRUE)
# Read annotation data
annotation_data <- read.delim("SRP021193.colData.tsv", sep = "\t", header = TRUE)

# Get group specific genes using statistical tests
group_specific_genes <- lapply(unique(annotation_data$group), function(group) {
  group_samples <- annotation_data$Sample[annotation_data$group == group]
  group_counts <- count_table[, group_samples]
  
  # Check if count table is not empty
  if (any(rowSums(group_counts) > 0)) {
    DGE <- DGEList(counts = group_counts)
    DGE <- calcNormFactors(DGE)
    design <- model.matrix(~group)
    fit <- glmFit(DGE, design)
    group_specific <- decideTests(fit)
    if (any(group_specific[group, ] == 1)){
      group_genes <- rownames(group_counts)[group_specific[group, ] == 1]
      return(group_genes)
    } else {
      return(NULL)
    }
  } else {
    return(NULL)
  }
})

# Remove NULL values if any
group_specific_genes <- Filter(Negate(is.null), group_specific_genes)

# Get the intersection of group specific genes
intersection_genes <- Reduce(intersect, group_specific_genes)

# Plot PCA using group specific genes
if (length(intersection_genes) > 0) {
  pca_data <- count_table[intersection_genes, ]
  pca_data <- t(pca_data[-1, ])
  pca <- prcomp(pca_data, scale. = TRUE)
  pca_df <- as.data.frame(pca$x)
  pca_df$group <- annotation_data$group
  ggplot(pca_df, aes(PC1, PC2, color = group)) +
    geom_point() +
    labs(title = "PCA Plot", x = "PC1", y = "PC2")
} else {
  print("No group-specific genes found.")
}
